extract_stair_riser_height.description: Extract riser height from IfcStair property sets in an IFC file

parameters.name: ifc_file_path
parameters.description: Path to the IFC file containing the stair elements

parameters.name: stair_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (GlobalId) of the IfcStair element

extract_stair_properties.description: Extract all properties and attributes for a specific stair element from an IFC file, including both direct attributes and property set data

parameters.name: ifc_file_path
parameters.description: Path to the IFC file to be processed

parameters.name: stair_id
parameters.description: The unique ID (GlobalId) of the stair element to extract properties for

extract_stair_flights.description: Extract all stair flight elements from an IFC file by filtering for IfcStairFlight entities

parameters.name: ifc_file_path
parameters.description: Path to the IFC file to process

get_stair_attributes.description: Extract basic attributes for a specific stair element identified by its GlobalId from an IFC file

parameters.name: global_id
parameters.description: GlobalId of the stair element to extract attributes from

extract_stairflight_riser_height.description: Extract riser height from IfcStairFlight property sets in IFC files

parameters.name: ifc_file_path
parameters.description: Path to the IFC file containing the stair flight elements

parameters.name: stairflight_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (GlobalId) of the IfcStairFlight element
